name: HELL RACER (ROBOK9, EX0t1cG, Lil_dodo21)
description:
A GOOD OLD LADY DIES AND IS NOW IN HELL. SURVIVE YOUR WAY OUT OF HEAVEN ( .. IF THERE IS ANY :) ) OR DIE IN THE PITS OF HELLS. BEWARE DONT GET CAUGHT BY THE DEVIL MINIONS CUZ DEATH IS JUST THE BEGINNING......

- NARRATOR ( DEVIL )

The game is a endless runner where the goal is create the highest score possible.
